mapper.select: SELECT `id` AS `id`, `text` AS `text` FROM `etb_bbs`.`boards` WHERE BINARY `id` = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT `index` AS `index`, `name` AS `name`, image AS `image`, image_type AS `imageType`, mfr AS `mfr`, calorie AS `calorie`, volume AS `volume`, degree AS `degree`, `description` AS `description`, category_index AS `categoryIndex`, created_on AS `createdOn`, modified_on AS `modifiedOn` FROM etb_data.beers WHERE `index` = #{beerIndex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `etb_bbs`.`review_articles` (user_email, beer_index, score, content_good, content_bad, view, written_on, modified_on) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{beerIndex}, #{score}, #{contentGood}, #{contentBad}, #{view}, IFNULL(#{writtenOn}, DEFAULT(`written_on`)), IFNULL(#{modifiedOn}, DEFAULT(`modified_on`)))
